data.name: Tint 'n Ink
data.detailed_description:
It's time to hunt down your rivals, discover the world of high-speed paint shooting. Let me introduce you to all the hectic content around the speedball, x-ball and recball inside Ink.


Tint 'n Ink invites you to enjoy the best matches of this sport as an e-sport. From team strategies in 5v5 elimination matches, through recreations of real military secuences, to famous bomb scenarios.


Learn and use the best tactics and techniques in the world, in quick matches with random guys and also on the major competitions.


Get and upgrade your prefered markers. with all the attachments available for you!



Markers manufacturers, Field Design Staff and Modders, will work hard to keep blowing your mind. Be sure to stay tune to get everything when it's out.

data.short_description: Have you ever heard about the Speedball? It's time to hunt down your rivals, discover the world of high-speed paint shooting. Let me introduce you to all the hectic content around the speedball, x-ball and recball inside Ink.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 10™
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 3200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 750 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 10™
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 2070 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
